entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 09:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa steady
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -15.0°C
Wind: SSE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
